Translations.Text: Impembo yabo iri ku Muremyi wabo, n’imirima y’ubuzima bwabo bwose budahera, kuko muriyo haca imbere yabo imyonga, baze babeyo mu buzima bwabo bwose, kuko Imana yarabemereye nabo barashima, iyo mpembo ni kuri urya muntu atinya Umuremyi wiwe
Mugihe Isi izo nyiganzwa inyigangizo rininiya cane
N’umuntu yaravuze ati:- mbega uno musi kuri iy’Isi hari iki
Kuri uwo musi Isi izo sesangura inkuru zayo zose
Kuko Umuremyi wayo yayitegetse kugira gutyo
Kuri uwo musi abantu bazova muntatemwa zabo bari imigwi n’iyindi, kugira ngo berekwe ibikorwa vyabo bagize
Rero	uwagize	ivyiza	naho	vyoba	bingana	n’uburemere	bw’akanyegeri azobona impembo yavyo
N’uwagize amabi naho yoba angana n’uburemere bw’akanyegeri azobona impembo yavyo
Ndarahiye kw’Ifarasi zigenda cane kandi zihema hema
Zigasohora umucanwa kumaguru yazo mugukubita amaguru yazo hasi
Zigatumura inkungugu nyinshi muri ico gihe nyene
Akaba afise urukundo runiniya cane rw’ugukunda amatungo
Mbega ntazi yuko igihe bazozurwa abari muntatemwa zabo
